pleistocene.advancement.root.desc: Welcome to the last glacial maximum. Explore, create, and survive as your ancestors did.
pleistocene.advancement.rock_n_roll.desc: This rock could be used to hit other rocks and make fancy, sharp rocks
pleistocene.advancement.primitive_techno: Get yourself a rock and a flint. Put them together. Hominids have been making stone tools like these for hundreds of thousands of years.
pleistocene.advancement.a_sharper_axe.de: An axe that won't break after chopping one tree. Now that's axe-xiting!
pleistocene.advancement.waste_not_want_n: Every part of the animal is useful. So turn that bone into a powerful weapon.
pleistocene.advancement.bone_to_pick.des: A bone pickaxe is faster and more durable than a flint one.
pleistocene.advancement.pleasing_the_god: This amethyst-imbued bone has been blessed by the Gods. It can be used to craft strong and durable weapons and armor.
pleistocene.advancement.forged_in_lava.d: Shiny, black obsidian must be processed in a high-temperature smelter before it can be crafted.
pleistocene.advancement.craft_hand_axe.d: Take a piece of flint and craft it. Now you have a primitive hand axe!
pleistocene.advancement.acquire_logs.des: Those logs are too tough to punch. Thankfully you have a trusty hand axe!
pleistocene.advancement.chop_chop.desc: Take one log and craft it. Now this looks like a good spot to place a log and chop it with an axe.
pleistocene.advancement.walk_the_plank.d: Planks can only be made on the chopping block.
pleistocene.advancement.crafting_time.de: Now take your four planks and make the iconic crafting bench
pleistocene.advancement.hearth.desc: An essential part of any base, the campfire is made with two logs and two sticks
pleistocene.advancement.two_sticks.desc: Take two sticks and put them together. It's the hot new trend!
It hasn't been burning forever. We had to light it ourselves.
pleistocene.advancement.tarzan.desc: Wow, thanks for covering that up.
pleistocene.advancement.been_feeling_dry: A drying rack can be used to transform certain items into other, more useful items. Try rawhide.
pleistocene.advancement.not_vegan.desc: Set some rawhide out to dry, then go take care of some chores. When you come back, you'll have genuine leather.
pleistocene.advancement.nice_fur.desc: ...be a shame if somebody skinned it.
Mix water and ashes to make one of the most ancient chemicals. It's useful stuff, especially for preparing pelts.
pleistocene.advancement.so_fluffy.desc: Prepared furs are fluffy enough to wear in the cold, and they're cozy to sleep on, too!
pleistocene.advancement.boots_with_the_f: The whole cave was looking at her.
pleistocene.advancement.reaper.desc: Your expertly-crafted bone weapons are feared by all the creatures of this land.
pleistocene.advancement.champion_of_the_: Your collection of imbued weapons please the Gods greatly.
You are the embodiment of a druid.
pleistocene.advancement.ice_age_fashioni: This leather outfit is all the rage in the cave.
pleistocene.advancement.obsidian_obsessi: That must have taken a lot of time...
pleistocene.advancement.mammoth_hunter.d: You are now counted among the honorable ranks of the mammoth hunters.
You'll make an archeologist very happy someday.
